Product.Product_Name: Lowa- Weisshorn GTX - 8 - Lime Black
Product.Long_Description: Handcrafted in Italy, the Weisshorn is LOWAs most technical mixed route alpine boot. FLEXFIT-SYNCHRO allows for comfortable ankle flex & articulation in steep terrain. Double tongue, with removable and adjustable inner tongue allows for perfect fit across the top of the foot. Foot hold is enhanced with our patented I-Lock. I-Core technology reduces weight, provides rigidity for automatic crampons.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Nepal EVO GTX Mountaineering Boot - 41
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Nepal EVO GTX Mountaineering Boot is the evolution of the original Nepal Extreme boot. Designed for technical mountaineering on high elevation terrain and ice, this boot benefits from a Gore-Tex/Duratherm lining which makes it completely waterproof and breathable. The innovative 3D Flex System allows your ankle an anatomical full-range of motion making movement more natural and stable without compromising holding power. Ibi-Thermo insulating foot beds stave off frostbite while integrated elastic gaiters keep the snow out. The Impact-Brake-System Vibram sole has integrated anti-shock air cushioning in the heel to smooth your way; tapered-TPU crampon-compatible midsoles coupled with expanded-PU, anti-shock inserts under the heel and ball of the foot further prevent excessive impact-fatigue. This boot is serious about mountaineering; just like you!
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Climbing Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Phantom Tech - 45.5 - Black/Orange
Product.Long_Description: Youll see them in the park at Ouray, sending big in Cody, and anywhere the temps plummet. For good reason, tooclimbers love the sensitivity and low weight for steep ice and mixed pitches. Nothing lets you climb better than warm, dry feet. Quick lacing for a customized fit. The same materials as Scarpas Himalayan boot, the Phantom 8000including a redesigned and more durable Flexsealzipper closure--so you get warmth for extreme environments, but in a svelte, sensitive iteration for objectives demanding precision climbing. The Phantom Tech draws on modern technology to create Scarpas most versatile cold-weather boot, at 20% less weight than a traditional leather mountaineering boot.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Phantom 6000 - 40 - Black/Orange
Product.Long_Description: Take all the high-altitude burl in the Phantom 6000. Schoeller, Kevlar, and Corduraouter material with Outdryfor weatherproof durability. Stay dry behind a Flexsealwaterproof closure. Hoard your heat with the felt and 4mm-EVA inner boot. Dont even consider a sloppy fit, either: a quick-lacing system with Dyneema cord for strength and a progressive fit. Climb steep water ice, slog snowy ridges, and walk in comfort. The Phantom 6000 delivers the comfort and climbing performance of a leather boot, but the warmth and multi-day versatility of a double boot. Go big.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut - Mamook Thermo Boot - 8 - Cyan-Black
Product.Long_Description: Following on from the highly acclaimed Mamook GTX, this warmer version has been developed and is now suitable for mountain tours. An individually adjustable, elastic and fold-down gaiter, ThinsulateUltra200 padding and a glove-compatible PowerStrap provided all the required functionalities for every situation. Robust Dropstop and Microfibre Racing textiles, cushioning Hybrid Shell, patented Base Fit system, asymmetrical lacing, high-grip vibram Teton sole and individually adjustable three-zone lacing system are some of the other technical highlights of this lightweight.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Climbing Shoes

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Solution Climbing Shoe - 35 - White
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Solution is a revolutionary rock climbing shoe developed specifically for bouldering and overhanging climbs. This shoe features La Sportivas P3 power platform, which supports and maintains theradicallydownturned shape and hooked toe. The innovative 3D heelcup adds ease and security to heel hooking moves, while a thick, rubberized toe enables tough toe hook maneuvers. Additionally, the Solution uses La SportivassLock Harness System for a foot-hugging fit that holds the heel in place.Finally, the easily adjustableFast Lacing System facilitates a customizable and secure fit. The Solution is an aggressive, high-performance tool for overhanging sport routes, hard boulder projects and technical face climbing. For the toughest problems, theres only one Solution.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Climbing Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten - Rogue VCS - 9 - Neon Blue Charcoal
Product.Long_Description: Designed with the basics in mind, the Rogue VCS is the ideal shoe for beginner climbers. The supportive midsole allows for increased feeling and sensitivity while the Stealth C4 outsole is great for smearing and climbing in the gym. A Velcro closure provides easier adjustability and a slightly higher-volume fit than the Rogue Lace. Its comfortable, partially-lined leather upper will stretch about a half-size to form to the personality of your foot.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace Womens - 33.5
Product.Long_Description: Featuring an asymmetric last and an unlined leather upper, the womens specific version of the Tarantulace is a comfortable climbing shoe with all of the performance youve come to expect from La Sportiva. The RN45 shoe shape is great for upper end performance without hurting your toes. The synthetic leather overlay lacing harness adds great support for entry to mid level climbers and the unlined leather is comfortable and soft. The aggressive rubber heel rand lets you stand in micro edges and the FriXion RS rubber is hard wearing yet sticky for long life. This is great shoe for gym climbers and outdoor climbers that need a one-quiver shoe that does it all.

The synthetic leather overlay lacing harness adds great support for entry to mid level climbers and the unlined leather is comfortable and soft. The aggressive rubber heel rand lets you stand in micro edges and the FriXion RS rubber is hard wearing yet sticky for long life. This is great shoe for gym climbers and outdoor climbers that need a one-quiver shoe that does it all.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Miura Womens Climbing Shoe - Size 34
Product.Long_Description: The Miura Womens from La Sportiva is the narrower womens lasted version of one of the most popular climbing shoes on the market. The Miura Womens has a performance fit with a highly asymmetrical shape, combined with a flatter last, which makes this shoe an excellent choice for technical climbing on terrain ranging from slabs to overhanging steeps. Sticky Vibram XS Grip 2 rubber provides unparalleled grip, which allows you to smear and grip tough holds. The Miura Womens also features La Sportivas innovative powerhinge sole cutout to control and minimize forward stretch, as well as a slingshot rand to transfer power efficiently to the toes for edging power. While the Miura Womens has technical features and a performance fit, its lace up design and Dentex lined leather construction allow the shoe to break in and mold to your feet for a snug, yet comfortable feel. If you want a true high performance do-it-all shoe with a narrow last, the Miura Womens is the easy choice.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Mythos Mens Climbing Shoe - 35 - Brown
Product.Long_Description: The Mythos from La Sportiva continues to be one of the most popular climbing shoes in the world because of its comfortable fit and all-purpose design. Regardless of your foot shape, the patented Mythos lacing allows you to tailor the fit of the shoe to ensure that your toes and heel stay in place without sizing down aggressively.Additionally, a supple unlined leather upper molds to your foot over time for a comfortable and unique fit. This shoe has a neutral fit and a flat last, which wont curl your toes or hurt your feet during long climbs. The Mythos featuresVibram XS Edge rubber for responsive edging performance and a perforated Vibram rubber rand that is durable while allowing stretch.This shoe is agreat choice for all-day comfort for crack climbing, face and slab climbing, big walls, or if you just need a shoe that wont hurt your toes.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Testarossa Climb Shoe - 38
Product.Long_Description: La Sportivas Testarossa features sick down-turned edging power is what you get in this high performance brilliantly designed work of art. La Sportiva strategically placed Lorica (does not stretch) and leather (does stretch) in specific patterns to design the most powerful edging machine on the market. They call it bi-lateral stretch technology. A 3D cupped Hytrel midsole under the toes ties into a high tension figure-eight rand that allows you to grab features with your feet and go for the chains.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Climbing Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Mad Rock - Mad Monkey Kids Climbing Shoe - 3
Product.Long_Description: Mad Rock has upgraded their ever popular Mad Monkey with two rear closure straps for even more size adjustability.The new dual closure system prevents straps from scratching delicate ankles when cinching down for a tighter fit. The Mad Monkey is perfect for little climbers whos feet are still growing as it is constructed with a stretchy SynFlex upper and R2 rand system for ultra comfort. Exuding fun in both form and function, it puts a smile on both parent and junior climber alike.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Vapor V - 40.5 - Lime
Product.Long_Description: Precise, versatile, and a best seller Scarpas Vapor V opens 5.15 performance to the masses, with an asymmetric and slightly downturned fit and Bi-Tension randing. Rather than jam toes forward, the rand connects beneath the toes and pulls backwards to the heel structure, the opposite of slingshot randing. The result? Power and precision, married to a stretch-gusseted airmesh tongue for comfort and Vibram XS Edge rubber. Sticky, energized, comfortable shoes for anything steep, indoors or out.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Vapor Lace - 37
Product.Long_Description: Critically acclaimed and award winning, Scarpas Vapor family is a perfect way to breathe new life into your climbing day. Quite often, improving climbers dont want to stray too far from tried and tested shoes, but increasingly they want to experiment on different types of terrain. SCARPA appreciates the opportunities that alternative versions of shoes with similar basic designs can unlock. The single piece synthetic upper promotes a new concept in comfort, and minimal stitching eliminates hot spots. The full length outsole and increased stiffness are matched with VibramXS Edge rubber to offer the most supportive lace up in the entire climbing collection. The Vapor lace is built on the same last and utilizes the same Active Rand as the Vapor V, complimenting its softer relative extremely well

Quite often, improving climbers dont want to stray too far from tried and tested shoes, but increasingly they want to experiment on different types of terrain. SCARPA appreciates the opportunities that alternative versions of shoes with similar basic designs can unlock. The single piece synthetic upper promotes a new concept in comfort, and minimal stitching eliminates hot spots. The full length outsole and increased stiffness are matched with VibramXS Edge rubber to offer the most supportive lace up in the entire climbing collection. The Vapor lace is built on the same last and utilizes the same Active Rand as the Vapor V, complimenting its softer relative extremely well
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Climbing Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Origin - 37
Product.Long_Description: The starting point in our climbing career is of fundamental importance. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shape our climbing lives. Scarpas Origin offers a lush leather upper, giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber, a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv - Shakra - 5.5 - Aqua Neon Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Shakra utilizes the same technology (love bump, knuckle box) as the highly successful Shaman in a lower volume and narrower fitting upper design. An amazing fit, a dual hook and loop closure system, and side-pressure relief rand design, make it an extremely comfortable high performance climbing shoe. Evolvs added even more rubber for optimal toe hooking and with a slightly softer midsole than the Shaman, the Shakra offers more sensitivity on the rock.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond - Shadow Climbing Shoes - 7.5 - Black
Product.Long_Description: When your project is so steep that it always casts a shadow, thats when you bust out these secret weapons. Built for overhanging sport routes and hard bouldering, the Shadow features an aggressive, downturned last with Black Diamonds sticky rubber thats moldedinspired by the way they forge their carabinersand not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is BDs engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for weight, consistency and comfort. The Shadow features a stretch resistant microfiber upper, and the shoes vamp features an innovative combination of printed and molded high friction rubber. The molded rubber is strategically placed in high-use areas, while the printed rubber minimizes bulk, and in combination, these rubbers provide better top of foot dexterity and purchase when toe-hooking. The tongue is made from BDs Engineered Knit Technology, which is exceptionally breathable and increases mobility and comfort. With a minimalist midsole, the Shadow is ultra-sensitive and allows you to pull in on steep terrain.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond - Shadow Climbing Shoes - 8 - Black
Product.Long_Description: When your project is so steep that it always casts a shadow, thats when you bust out these secret weapons. Built for overhanging sport routes and hard bouldering, the Shadow features an aggressive, downturned last with Black Diamonds sticky rubber thats moldedinspired by the way they forge their carabinersand not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is BDs engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for weight, consistency and comfort. The Shadow features a stretch resistant microfiber upper, and the shoes vamp features an innovative combination of printed and molded high friction rubber. The molded rubber is strategically placed in high-use areas, while the printed rubber minimizes bulk, and in combination, these rubbers provide better top of foot dexterity and purchase when toe-hooking. The tongue is made from BDs Engineered Knit Technology, which is exceptionally breathable and increases mobility and comfort. With a minimalist midsole, the Shadow is ultra-sensitive and allows you to pull in on steep terrain.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - MOMENTUM LACE MENS - 70 - Ash
Product.Long_Description: Built for unparalleled comfort during all day cragging and gym sessions, the Momentum Lace is a shoe that combines innovative technology with a classic, flat-last design. The result is an entry-level shoe that excels in performance. With an upper fabric that consists entirely of Black Diamonds Engineered Knit Technology, the Momentum Lace provides stretch where you need it, support where it matters and all around exceptional breathability. Theyve also added a micro-fiber liner to the front of the shoe to minimize stretch and maximize comfort. The Momentums durable rubber is unique in that its moldedinspired by the way they forge their carabinersversus cut from one sheet of rubber. This is their engineered solution to optimize our shoes rubber and rands for durability and comfort. Designed for all-day comfort on moderate routes, boulders or gym sessions, the Momentum features a soft-flex midsole for sensitivity and lace-up adjustability, making it the perfect entry level climbing shoe. These shoes run small our OGExperts recommend up to one-half size above your street size. If you have any questions about sizing, please contact our OGExperts via LiveChat or call 888-547-4327.

The Momentums durable rubber is unique in that its moldedinspired by the way they forge our carabinersversus cut from one sheet of rubber. Designed for all-day comfort on moderate routes, boulders or gym sessions, the Momentum features a soft-flex midsole for sensitivity and lace-up adjustability, making it the perfect entry level climbing shoe. These shoes run small our climbing experts recommend up to one size above your street size. If you have any questions about sizing, please contact us via LiveChat or call 888-547-4327.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - FOCUS MENS - 7 - Rust
Product.Long_Description: Engineered to provide laser precision on routes and boulder problems that require absolute focus, this dual-Velcro, high-performance shoe has a slightly downturned last for edging prowess on steeper terrain. With the highest grade European leather upper and BDs Engineered Knit Technology tongue, the Focus provides breathability and durability. They also printed high friction rubber on the vamp area of the shoethis innovative process minimizes bulk while maximizingdexterity and grip for toe-hooking. The sole of the Focus is BDs stiff, durable rubber thats moldedinspired by the way they forge their carabinersand not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is their engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for weight, consistency and comfort. Its stiff-flex midsole is ideal for micro-edging. The Focus also features medial and lateral stabilizerrandsto increase precision by keeping your foot from rollingwhen pressure is applied to the outside or inside edges.

Product.Product_Name: FIVE TEN - ROGUE VCS SYNTH - 85 - Olive
Product.Long_Description: Designed with the basics in mind, the Rogue VCS is the ideal shoe for beginner climbers. The supportive midsole allows for increased feeling and sensitivity while the Stealth C4 outsole is great for smearing and climbing in the gym. A Velcro closure provides easier adjustability and a slightly higher-volume fit than the Rogue Lace. Its comfortable synthetic Clarino upper wont stretch out, providing reliable sizing out of the box and onto the wall.

Product.Product_Name: MAD ROCK - PULSE POSITIVE - 7.5 - Blue/Black
Product.Long_Description: Mad Rocks Pulse Positive shoe is a solid all around climbing shoe. Its a medium flexing shoe, with a breathable polyester upper mesh and lace closure system, that has small curvature to the shape. This is a great shoe for a beginner intermediate climbing looking to experiment with all forms of climbing, plus its vegan friendly!

Product.Product_Name: MAD ROCK - PULSE POSITIVE - 12.5 - Blue/Black
Product.Long_Description: Mad Rocks Pulse Positive shoe is a solid all around climbing shoe. Product.Product_Name: MAD ROCK - DRONE HV - 8.5 - Blue/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Mad Rock Drone HV is a high-performance shoe designed with comfort in mind. Performance-grade stretchy materials in all the key places mould to the foots shape, eliminating any dead spots and pressure points your unique foot shape might produce. Noticing that the heel seems to be a problem area for a lot of climbers, Mad Rocks new Expandable Edge Heel design will stretch to fit most heel shapes and sizes so you can size the whole shoe correctly. This shoes aggressive shape will be ideal for anything overhanging, from hard sport climbing to bouldering, but its high comfort will keep your feet happy for much longer on longer routes or big days.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - MOMENTUM VEGAN MENS - 8 - Carbon
Product.Long_Description: The latest addition to Black Diamonds award-winning Momentum line of climbing shoes, the Momentum Vegan brings the same qualities, only now the materials are completely veganthats right, no animal products are on this shoes construction. Designed to provide unparalleled comfort for all-day cragging and gym sessions, the Momentum Vegan is a two-strap Velcro shoe that combines innovative technology with a classic, flat-last design to create an entry-level shoe that excels in performance. With an upper fabric that consists entirely of their Engineered Knit Technology, the Momentum Vegan provides stretch where you need it, support where it matters and all-around exceptional breathability. Theyve also added a micro-fiber liner to the front of the shoe to minimize stretch and maximize comfort. The Momentum Vegans durable rubber is unique in that its moldedinspired by the way we forge our carabinersversus cut from one sheet of rubber. This is Black Diamonds engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for weight, consistency, and comfort. Built for all-day comfort on moderate routes, boulders or gym sessions, the Momentum Vegan features a soft-flex midsole for sensitivity and is the perfect entry-level climbing shoe.

Designed to provide unparalleled comfort for all-day cragging and gym sessions, the Momentum Vegan is a two-strap Velcro shoe that combines innovative technology with a classic, flat-last design to create an entry-level shoe that excels in performance. With an upper fabric that consists entirely of their Engineered Knit Technology, the Momentum Vegan provides stretch where you need it, support where it matters and all-around exceptional breathability. Theyve also added a micro-fiber liner to the front of the shoe to minimize stretch and maximize comfort. The Momentum Vegans durable rubber is unique in that its moldedinspired by the way we forge our carabinersversus cut from one sheet of rubber. This is Black Diamonds engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for weight, consistency, and comfort. Built for all-day comfort on moderate routes, boulders or gym sessions, the Momentum Vegan features a soft-flex midsole for sensitivity and is the perfect entry-level climbing shoe.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - ZONE LV CLIMBING SHOES - 5.5 - Octane
Product.Long_Description: The Zone LV is a two-strap Velcro shoe that combines the award-winning comfort and breathability of Black Diamonds Momentum climbing shoes, with the high-performance last of their Shadows to create a shoe built for sending at the gym or the crag. The Zones upper consist of their Engineered Knit Technology, which provides stretch where you need it, support where it matters and all around exceptional breathability-meaning you can go hard at the gym without worrying about your feet overheating. The shoes last is downturned and based on BDs aggressive shape, making the Zone adept at pulling hard on steep rock or plastic. The Zones sticky Fuze rubber is molded inspired by the way they forge their carabiners and not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is their engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for consistency and comfort. The shoes vamp area also has printed rubber for extra friction while toe-hooking, and the medium-flex midsole adds a balance of sensitivity and power. For hard training sessions, this is the Zone you want to be in.

The Zones sticky Fuze rubber is molded inspired by the way they forge their carabiners and not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is BDs engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for consistency and comfort. The shoes vamp area also has printed rubber for extra friction while toe-hooking, and the medium-flex midsole adds a balance of sensitivity and power. For hard training sessions, this is the Zone you want to be in.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Helix Rock Shoe Men - 39 - Smoke/Parrot
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Helix rock climbing shoe is a comfortable all-around shoe for beginner or intermediate climbers that delivers performance and comfort at a great price. Featuring a forgiving flat last, a supple unlined suede upper that will mold to the foot over time, as well as lace-up construction for a dialed-in fit, the Helix is comfortable for long days of climbing at the gym or out at the crag. The Helix is a great choice for your first shoe, or if you value comfort in your climbing shoe selection.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace - 36 - Flame
Product.Long_Description: The TarantuLace is an unlined leather climbing shoe with asymmetric shape for advanced performance. TheTarantuLace shoe shape is great for upper-end performance without hurting your toes. The synthetic leather overlay lacing harness adds great support for entry to mid-level climbers and the unlined leather is comfortable and soft. The aggressive rubber heel rand lets you stand in micro edges and the FriXion RS rubber is hard wearing yet sticky for long life. This is a great shoe for gym climbers and outdoor climbers that need a one-quiver shoe that does it all.

Product.Product_Name: Arc'teryx - KONSEAL FL SHOE MENS - 9 - Nocturne/Red Beach
Product.Long_Description: Stable, yet built to move quickly across technical terrain, the Konseal FL is designed for fast, light approaches, but performs anywhere comfort and confident footing are required. The fit is precise, and the minimalist design sheds grams and reduces debris collection. A versatile Vibram Megagrip outsole provides a secure grip, while a TPU midfoot chassis and raised midsole perimeter sidewalls provide stability on shifting surfaces.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - MISSION LT M - 8 - Eclipse Blue Amber
Product.Long_Description: Engineered for speed approaches, the Black Diamond Mission LT is the approach shoe you want for mountain adventures that push the barriers in both scale and technical terrain. Designed with a sock-like, bootie fit, thats reinforced with a webbing cinch system, the Mission LT is lightweight and slips on to provide security and comfort that lasts all day. The Mission LT features our signature EnduroKnit, which is a one-piece, ultra-breathable upper for lasting temperature regulation thats hyper-durable for season after season of abuse. A tuned EVA midsole provides ample stiffness for technical precision, while remaining comfortable and the nylon rock plate provides protection. The Mission LTs high-performance BlackLabel-Mountain rubber is super sticky, allowing you to grip through technical moves on 5th class terrain with ease, and the rubber toe protection gives the Mission LT added security. Multiple webbing loops give you plenty of tagging and stowing options when the approach ends and the hard climbing begins.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes
